item.title: Italy Erases 600 years of Scientific Progress
item.description:
The next time some liberal tells you the United States needs to act more like Europe, tell them, “no, we believe in science.”
Italy sentenced six scientists to prison for the felony of failing to predict an earthquake. Seriously. The people who brought us da Vinci, Columbus, and Marconi believe that those wizards in lab coats with all the machines that go “beep” are actually gods who control the earth and the stars.
